chapters.title: The Awakening Village
chapters.mission: Find a clue about where the ancient dragon sleeps
chapters.intro: You wake up in a small village at the edge of a misty forest. The villagers whisper about a legendary dragon that once protected these lands. They say someone here might know where it rests.
choices: Talk to the village elder
Visit the old library
Explore the marketplace
Wander into the forest edge

chapters.title: The Whispering Forest
chapters.mission: Navigate through the enchanted forest to find the hidden path
chapters.intro: Armed with the Ancient Scroll, you enter the Whispering Forest. The trees seem alive, their leaves rustling with secrets. Strange creatures watch from the shadows, and multiple paths wind deeper into the woods.
choices: Follow the glowing mushrooms
Listen to where the wind blows strongest
Ask a friendly forest spirit for guidance
Climb a tall tree to see above the canopy

chapters.title: The Crystal Caverns
chapters.mission: Discover the secret entrance to the dragon's mountain
chapters.intro: The forest path leads you to magnificent crystal caverns. Light dances off countless gems embedded in the walls. Somewhere within these sparkling tunnels lies the way to the Dragon's Mountain.
choices: Follow the warmest air current
Examine the crystal patterns on the walls
Search for ancient markings or symbols
Listen for echoes from deeper within

chapters.title: The Dragon's Mountain
chapters.mission: Reach the dragon's lair at the peak
chapters.intro: You stand at the base of a towering mountain wreathed in clouds. The air grows warmer as you ascend. Ancient stairs carved into the rock wind upward, but the path is treacherous and guardians may lurk ahead.
choices: Take the main stone stairway
Find an alternative climbing route
Search for a hidden tunnel entrance
Call out to announce your peaceful intentions

chapters.title: The Awakening
chapters.mission: Wake the ancient dragon and earn its trust
chapters.intro: You finally reach the dragon's lairâ€”a vast chamber filled with golden light. Before you lies the magnificent ancient dragon, slumbering peacefully. The Dragon Scale Amulet glows warmly in your hand. How will you approach this legendary creature?
choices: Approach slowly and bow respectfully
Sing an ancient dragon lullaby in reverse
Place the amulet near the dragon's heart
Speak words of friendship and peace
